name: Yardstick
description: Yardstick is a Specialty Coffee roasting company operating since 2013 out of Manila, Philippines. We are in the constant pursuit of pushing the envelope to keep increasing the ‘yardstick’ of what coffee means for the coffee industry and enthusiasts in the Philippines.

name: Basilio
description: Basilio Coffee is carefully processed and precision “Air Roasted” to bring out the desired and inherent coffee flavors and aroma. Basilio is a coffee brand that shares -- fair trade coffee grown and produced by Filipino farmers all over the Philippines.

name: Escolta Coffee Company
description: Escolta Coffee Co. is a Manila-based coffee roaster whose team is obsessed with coffee and its journey from cherry to cup and the potential unlocked every step of the way. We’re passionate about sourcing great-tasting responsibly produced coffee in the Philippines and elsewhere in the globe.

name: Good Cup Coffee Co.
description: Based in the heart of Cebu City, Good Cup Coffee Co is a roastery & café that sources, imports, and roasts coffee beans from top farms in the Philippines & around the world and deliver them to our global customer base.

name: Plain Sight
description: Our mission is to serve great coffee, and to make great coffee accessible to everyone. We make sure to guide you in every step of your coffee journey, from sourcing, roasting, and supply to training and education.

name: Crema & Cream
description: Backed by science, passion, dedication and hard work, we spent out years honing our craft. From roasting, to brewing, to serving and even teaching, we make sure we deliver our very best not only in quality, but hospitality, and professionalism as well.
